Name: Buckwheat
Description: A more wild kind of wheat, it is somewhat bitter.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una variante más salvaje  de trigo; es algo amargo.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une version sauvage du blé, plus amère.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egy vadabb gabonaféle. Az íze kesernyés.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: コムギより野生に近く、少し苦い。
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Более дикий сорт пщеницы, немного горькая.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Buğdayın biraz daha yabanisi, daha acı bir tadı var.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一种未驯化的小麦，有点苦。
